name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-app-hello-world-python
title: Microsoft Teams Python Hello World Sample
shortDescription: The Microsoft Teams Python Hello World Sample app demonstrates key features of Teams, including tabs, bots, and messaging extensions, built with Python. It’s a great starting point for developing and deploying custom Teams apps.
longDescription: The Microsoft Teams Python Hello World Sample app demonstrates key features of Teams, including tabs, bots, and messaging extensions, built with Python. It’s a great starting point for developing and deploying custom Teams apps.
